alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Greenville and southern Spartanburg Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 707 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Spartanburg, or near Reidville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Greer, Taylors, Five Forks, Woodruff, Duncan, Roebuck, Reidville, Croft State Park and GSP Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
